headline: A Whole Lot of Spice, Amid a Few Tons of Salt
abstract: The former sitcom star and anti-aging mogul shares her tips for staying young. (They include having sex every day.)
lead_paragraph: “I’d love to say it was because I had too much sex,” Suzanne Somers said.
keywords: A New Way to Age: The Most Cutting-Edge Advances in Antiaging (Book)
